items.value:
"Hey there! I'm Mr. Daycare!"
Mr. Daycare is the man who runs the daycare! He's very good at keeping things in order!
You'll be sitting in the timeout corner for
Do not run inside the hallway!
Do not consume beverages inside the hallway!
Do not eat food inside the hallway!
Do not throw things at faculty members inside the hallway!
Do not leave the timeout corner without my permission inside the hallway!
Do not make loud sounds in the hallway!

Pie
One of Dave's countless home-baked pies! While you could eat it,
it's more fun to throw these towards unsuspecting victims!

Door Key
The end-all-be-all solution to unlocking all (non-swinging) doors!
It is also quite sturdy for its use case...
